short_summary: NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support
description: NGINX software license subscription, including maintenance, support and parchased software for the DND Department of National Defence
full_summary:
# Tender Open for NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support
## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: **BPM019321/23493**
* Title: NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support for DND
* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tender Closing Date: September 12th, 2023, 14:00:00 hours
## Contract Details
* Contract Category: Goods and Services
* Contract Value: To be determined by the Contractor
* Contract Duration: Period commencing on date of contract award, and ending on the date specified by the Contracting Authority.
## Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Authority Contact:
	+ Name: Agnes Kowalska
	+ Email: [agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 343-551-9034
	+ Fax: 000-000-0000
## Description of Goods and Services
The contracting authority requires NGINX software license subscription, maintenance, and support services for the Department of National Defence, located in Kingston, Ontario.

## Vendor Requirements
* Technical and financial capabilities to deliver the required goods and services
* Compliance with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive
* Pricing must be submitted according to the Annex A, List of Deliverables and Pricing

## Submissions
* Suppliers are required to submit electronic bids through the Contracting Authority's email
* Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted except in exceptional circumstances

## Instructions to Vendors
To be declared responsive, vendor's submissions must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation. Evaluation will be based on the mandatory and discretionary criteria outlined in the bid solicitation document. The vendor with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

## Important Notice
Due to COVID-19 pandemic, additional protocols are being put in place to ensure the health and safety of contracting authority staff and contractors.

## Attachments
* Contracting Authority's email address: [agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Link to the bid solicitation document: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/375628F4-FBA2-
